text.jpText: 前回のオグリキャップに次いで、優駿たちが新たな伝説を築くべく\n『有馬記念』に挑みます
text.enText: Following the success of Oguri Cap last time, these heroes will\ntake on the Arima Kinen to create a new legend!

text.jpText: 先頭でゴールを駆け抜けるのは1番人気のメジロマックイーンか？\nそれとも歴戦のライバルたちか？
text.enText: Who will take the lead at the finish line, the most popular\nhorse in the field, MedillomacQueen? Or will it be her rivals?

text.jpText: 今、大歓声を噛みしめるように、\nウマ娘たちが力強くスタンド前を駆け抜けていきます！
text.enText: Now, as if biting into the loud cheers, the Uma Musume are\npowerfully running through the stands!

text.jpText: 歓声が……皆さんの応援が、\n私をまた一歩前へと押してくれますわ
text.enText: Your cheers… and your support will push me forward another step.

text.jpText: 本当にいい走りだね、マックイーン、\n春の『天皇賞』の時と同じ……ううん、それ以上かも
text.enText: You're running really well, McQueen. You're running\njust as well as you did at the Tennoushou in\nthe spring… Or maybe even better.

text.jpText: 調子はずっと変わってません……\nただ、皆さんの期待と歯車が噛み合わなかっただけ
text.enText: The tone hasn't changed for a long time. … It's just that the\ngears didn't mesh with your expectations.

text.jpText: 各ウマ娘、第4コーナーを回って最後の直線へ入っていきます！\nグランプリの栄光はもう目の前だ！　残り300m！
text.enText: Each horse girl, rounding the fourth corner and\nentering the final straight! The glory of the\nGrand Prix is at hand! 300 meters to go!

text.jpText: しっかり噛み合った今の私なら、きっと！
text.enText: Now that I'm firmly engaged, I'm sure I will!

text.jpText: ここでメジロマックイーンがラストスパート！\n前との距離が一気に縮まるっ！
text.enText: Here comes the last spurt of the race for MegillomacQueen! The\ndistance to the front is closing fast!

text.jpText: 3番手、2番手！\nやはり現役最強ウマ娘はメジロマックイーンか！？
text.enText: Third place, second place! After all, the strongest horse girl\nin the field is probably MegilomacQueen!

text.jpText: しかし内からも1人、すごい末脚で上がってくる！\nこれはどうなる！？　2人とも全く譲らない！　勝者はどっちだ！？
text.enText: But there's also one from the inside, coming up with an amazing\nendurance! What's going to happen now? Neither of them will give\nup at all! Who will be the winner?
